title: A friendly reminder...
body: If you get a message from your friend along the lines of "Hey, want some free RP" or "I tried this RP thing and it really works" please just send them a message saying their account got hacked and to change their password. They probably fell for the "free rp" scam and gave their login info. It's really easy to continue playing without ever realizing someone got your password. If people continue to be ignorant about this, the scammers run rampant. So please, help a friend out.
